content: hi you can see the full free pattern when you click the link here on ravelry and head to the blog simply scroll down to see it there is also an ad-free printable version available for purchase on etsy hope you enjoy it featuring a drapey oversized fit cozy pockets and generous sleeves this cardi is right on trend and comfy as can be try pairing it with a graphic tee jeans or even shorts it s a super easy knit with minimal shaping so just about anyone can make it and because it s made with chunky yarn and big needles it s a quick knit too have fun us size 15 10 mm 36 circular knitting needles & straight needles optional 5 6 7 8 lion brand yarn hue & me in ozone 125 g/skein or comparable chunky #5 yarn you could also hold two strands of worsted weight together in order to more closely match the thickness of the chunky yarn as a substitute pattern uses approximately 572 669 783 916 scissors tapestry needle measuring tape hope you enjoy this sweater
